page.title: 14LIFE STYLES IN HINXWORTH
page.content: The population of Hinxworth and Edworth has changed from mostly farmers and labourers to mostly professional people who can afford all the modern conveniences e.g. no house is now without a washing machine, all have televisions, most have cars and many have microwave ovens, videos Hi-Fis and some even have their own home computers. Many can afford to go abroad for holidays most going at least as far as the continent and many much further. Eating out is popular and our local pub does very good bar meals.Local events of all sorts are well patronised as most people have consciously decided to live in a village and therefore feel that joining in the life of the village is important.
